original_text: Samson replied, ‘Someone would have to use seven new strings for bows. The strings must not have become dry. If they use those strings to tie me up, I will become weak, like other men.’
korean_text: 삼손이 그에게 이르되 만일 마르지 아니한 새 활줄 일곱으로 나를 결박하면 내가 약해져서 다른 사람과 같으리라

sentences.original_text: Someone would have to use seven new strings for bows
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 활을 위한 일곱 개의 새 끈을 사용해야 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: The strings must not have become dry
If they use those strings to tie me up
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 그 끈들로 나를 묶는다면
